messages: Your eyes were distracted by a dementor looking shape in the trees. You burnt your mashmallow.
The best way to enjoy marshmallow is with friends oh look fellow Hedwig Haven members coming to join you.
WOW a shooting star, it must be your lucky day shooting stars and marshmallows.
INCENDIO, lets get thhis camp fire started to roast these marshmallows.
A large gathering and people having fun lets hope *Umbridge* doesnt hear about this. We better eat the evidence
Did you know that in the 1989â€“1990 school year at the Romanian Dragon Sanctuary *Bill Weasley* and his gang ate mashmallows by the campire just like you!
During 1991-1992 school year both Harry and Ron roasted marshmallows, I wonder if they played fluffy bunnies.
What is made of sugar, water, and gelatin and in a cyclinder shape? Marshmallows.
